title: Nandi Hills Sunrise Trek, Bangalore
description: Experience the magical sunrise from Nandi Hills with a guided trek and breakfast.
about: This guided trek includes a short hike, breakfast, and pickup options from Bangalore city center.

title: Boat Cruise on Ulsoor Lake, Bangalore
description: Enjoy a calm evening boat cruise with light refreshments and live music.
about: Perfect for couples or groups, includes refreshments, safety jackets, and a 1-hour guided cruise.

title: Coffee Trail Experience, Coorg
description: Walk through coffee plantations and learn how your favorite brew is made.
about: Includes plantation tour, roasting demo, and tasting session with local snacks.

title: Desert Safari Adventure, Jaisalmer
description: Ride through the golden dunes with a sunset camel safari and traditional Rajasthani dinner.
about: Includes camel ride, jeep safari, cultural performance, buffet dinner, and campfire.

title: Backwater Houseboat Stay, Alleppey
description: Cruise through Kerala’s tranquil backwaters in a private luxury houseboat.
about: Enjoy a 1-day stay with meals, local guide, and sunset views on Vembanad Lake.

title: Paragliding at Bir Billing, Himachal Pradesh
description: Soar high over the Himalayas with India’s most scenic paragliding experience.
about: Tandem paragliding with certified pilots, safety gear, and optional GoPro recording.
